markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 15"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Antimagic](/Equipment.aspx?ID=282)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 582 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 6,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This intricate rune displaces spell energy, granting you a +1 status bonus to saving throws against magical effects.

<document level="2" id="action-179" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of _dispel magic_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Antimagic
